name: System Inventory
description: Commands for gathering system information, processes, services, and installed updates
author: Luc

commands.label: List Processes (summary)
commands.description: Lists all running processes with PID, name, company, and start time
commands.commandText: Get-Process | Select-Object Id, ProcessName, Company, StartTime | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 2

commands.label: List Services
commands.description: Lists all Windows services with name, status, and start type
commands.commandText: Get-Service | Select-Object Name, Status, StartType | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 2

commands.label: Drivers Summary
commands.description: Lists system drivers with name, state, and start mode
commands.commandText: Get-CimInstance Win32_SystemDriver | Select-Object Name, State, StartMode | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 2

commands.label: Installed Updates
commands.description: Lists installed Windows updates with HotFix ID, installed date, and description
commands.commandText: Get-HotFix | Select-Object HotFixID, InstalledOn, Description | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 2

commands.label: System Logs (recent 200)
commands.description: Retrieves the most recent 200 System event log entries
commands.commandText: Get-WinEvent -LogName System -MaxEvents 200 | Select-Object TimeCreated, Id, LevelDisplayName, Message | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 2

commands.label: Disk Usage Summary
commands.description: Shows disk volumes with size, free space, and usage percentage
commands.commandText: Get-Volume | Where-Object {$_.DriveLetter} | Select-Object DriveLetter, FileSystemLabel, Size, SizeRemaining, @{Name='UsedGB';Expression={[math]::Round(($_.Size - $_.SizeRemaining) / 1GB, 2)}}, @{Name='UsedPercent';Expression={[math]::Round((($_.Size - $_.SizeRemaining) / $_.Size) * 100, 1)}} | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 2

commands.label: Computer System Info
commands.description: Retrieves detailed computer system information (OS, BIOS, hardware)
commands.commandText: Get-ComputerInfo | Select-Object CsName, WindowsVersion, OsArchitecture, CsTotalPhysicalMemory, BiosManufacturer, BiosVersion | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 2

commands.label: Installed Programs
commands.description: Lists installed programs from registry (current user and machine)
commands.commandText: Get-ItemProperty HKLM:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall\*, HKLM:\Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall\* | Where-Object {$_.DisplayName} | Select-Object DisplayName, DisplayVersion, Publisher, InstallDate | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 2

commands.label: Environment Variables
commands.description: Lists all environment variables (current user scope)
commands.commandText: Get-ChildItem Env: | Select-Object Name, Value | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 2

commands.label: PowerShell Version Info
commands.description: Shows current PowerShell version and edition
